body:
Is it possible to do something like this in SubSonic3?

	_db.Update<Product>()
	    .Set("UnitPrice")
	    .EqualTo(UnitPrice + 5)
	    .Where<Product>(x=>x.ProductID==5)
	    .Execute();
	

I would need something lik this:

	UPDATE      Blocks
	SET         OrderId = OrderId - 1
	WHERE       ComponentId = 3
	

But in SubSonic3
title: SubSonic3 Update Question
